languages.text: "Все хотят у вас служить, людей все больше и больше. Мы, когда заброшенный сектор под новые спальные расчищали, нашли забытое хранилище — оно вдоль днища шло, буквально ногами по нему ходили. В общем, оказалось, что в хранилище том исправные орудия столетней давности, чудные такие, но вроде мощные! Техножрецы нам помогли с установкой, освятили орудия — теперь будете еще лучше разить врагов династии!"

traits.locale_text: "Все хотят у вас служить, людей все больше и больше. Мы, когда расчищали заброшенный сектор под новые спальные расщичали, нашли забытое хранилище — оно вдоль днища шло, буквально ногами по нему ходили. В общем, оказалось, что в хринилище том исправные орудия столетней давности, чудные такие, но вроде мощные! Техножрецы нам помогли с установкой, освятили орудия — теперь будете еще лучше разить врагов династии!"

languages.text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"
languages.original_text: "Все хотят у вас служить, людей все больше и больше. Мы, когда заброшенный сектор под новые спальные расчищали, нашли забытое хранилище — оно вдоль днища шло, буквально ногами по нему ходили. В общем, оказалось, что в хранилище том исправные орудия столетней давности, чудные такие, но вроде мощные! Техножрецы нам помогли с установкой, освятили орудия — теперь будете еще лучше разить врагов династии!"

traits.locale_text: "Everyone wants to serve you, and their numbers keep growing. When we were clearing out the abandoned sector for new cabins, we found a forgotten vault: it went along the bottom of the ship, literally under our feet. So, turned out the vault contained hundred years-old weapons, still working, strange ones, but seemingly powerful! Tech-Priests helped us with installation, consecrated the weapons — now you will be able to strike the enemies of the dynasty with even greater force!"

"Everyone wants to serve you, and their numbers keep growing. When we were clearing out the abandoned sector for new cabins, we found a forgotten vault: it went along the bottom of the ship, literally under our feet. So, turned out the vault contained hundred years-old weapons, still working, strange ones, but seemingly powerful! Tech-Priests helped us with installation, consecrated the weapons — now you will be able to strike the enemies of the dynasty with even greater force!"

"Everyone wants to serve you, and their numbers keep growing. When we were clearing out the abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault: it was on the bottom of the ship, literally beneath our feet. It turned out the vault contained centuries-old weapons — they look strange, but still work and are quite powerful! Our Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — now you can strike your enemies with even greater force!"

"Everyone wants to serve you, and their numbers keep growing. When we were clearing out the abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault: it was on the bottom of the ship, literally beneath our feet. It turned out the vault contained centuries-old weapons — they look strange, but still work and are quite powerful! Our Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — now you can strike your enemies with even greater force!"

"Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

languages.text: “每个人都想为您效力，愿意为您付出一切的人越来越多！之前，我们在清理飞船的废弃区域，改造生活区的时候，发现了一个被遗忘的保险库。那个地方就在飞船底层甲板，就在我们脚底下！保险库里放着几百年前的武器，虽然看起来有点怪，但威力相当强大！善良的技术神甫已经帮忙组装了这些武器，对它们进行了祝福。您飞船的火力已经变得更强了，可以轻而易举碾碎您的敌人！”
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

traits.locale_text: “每个人都想为您效力，愿意为您付出一切的人越来越多！之前，我们在清理飞船的废弃区域，改造生活区的时候，发现了一个被遗忘的保险库。那个地方就在飞船底层甲板，就在我们脚底下！保险库里放着几百年前的武器，虽然看起来有点怪，但威力相当强大！善良的技术神甫已经帮忙组装了这些武器，对它们进行了祝福。您飞船的火力已经变得更强了，可以轻而易举碾碎您的敌人！”

languages.text: « Tous souhaitent ardemment vous servir et le nombre des volontaires se fait plus important d'heure en heure ! L'autre jour, alors que nous nettoyions un secteur abandonné afin d'y établir de nouveaux quartiers, nous avons découvert une crypte secrète. Juste là, sous nos pieds, dans la cale du vaisseau ! Or, il se trouve que cette crypte contenait des armes vieilles de plusieurs siècles. Elles sont étranges, certes, mais tout aussi redoutables ! Les braves technoprêtres se sont chargés de leur assemblage et de leur consécration. Vous pourrez désormais affronter vos ennemis avec un arsenal plus puissant que jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

traits.locale_text: « Tous souhaitent ardemment vous servir et le nombre des volontaires se fait plus important d'heure en heure ! L'autre jour, alors que nous nettoyions un secteur abandonné afin d'y établir de nouveaux quartiers, nous avons découvert une crypte secrète. Juste là, sous nos pieds, dans la cale du vaisseau ! Or, il se trouve que cette crypte contenait des armes vieilles de plusieurs siècles. Elles sont étranges, certes, mais tout aussi redoutables ! Les braves technoprêtres se sont chargés de leur assemblage et de leur consécration. Vous pourrez désormais affronter vos ennemis avec un arsenal plus puissant que jamais ! »

languages.text: 「誰もがあなたにお仕えすることを望み、その人数は日々増え続けております。新しい居住区のために放棄された区域を整理している際に、忘れら去られた貯蔵室を発見いたしました。場所は船の底部、まさしく我々の足元の真下です。貯蔵室には数百年前の武器が眠っている事が分かりました…外見は奇妙ですが、まだ動きますし威力も非常に強力です！技術司祭が、武器の組み立てと聖別を手伝ってくれました…今やさらに強大な火力で敵を攻撃できるようになったのです！」
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

traits.locale_text: 「誰もがあなたにお仕えすることを望み、その人数は日々増え続けております。新しい居住区のために放棄された区域を整理している際に、忘れら去られた貯蔵室を発見いたしました。場所は船の底部、まさしく我々の足元の真下です。貯蔵室には数百年前の武器が眠っている事が分かりました…外見は奇妙ですが、まだ動きますし威力も非常に強力です！技術司祭が、武器の組み立てと聖別を手伝ってくれました…今やさらに強大な火力で敵を攻撃できるようになったのです！」

languages.text: «Todo el mundo quiere servir a sus órdenes, ¡no damos abasto con tanto voluntario! Por eso, el otro día, cuando estábamos despejando un sector abandonado para preparar nuevos camarotes, encontramos una bóveda olvidada: estaba en la sentina de la nave; pasábamos por encima de ella a diario. Bueno, pues resulta que en la bóveda había armas de hace siglos. Tienen un aspecto algo extraño, ¡pero son muy poderosas! Los buenos tecnosacerdotes nos ayudaron a montarlas y consagrarlas, ¡y ahora podrá abatir a sus enemigos con más poder que nunca!».
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo quiere servir a sus órdenes, ¡no damos abasto con tanto voluntario! Por eso, el otro día, cuando estábamos despejando un sector abandonado para preparar nuevos camarotes, encontramos una bóveda olvidada: estaba en la sentina de la nave; pasábamos por encima de ella a diario. Bueno, pues resulta que en la bóveda había armas de hace siglos. Tienen un aspecto algo extraño, ¡pero son muy poderosas! Los buenos tecnosacerdotes nos ayudaron a montarlas y consagrarlas, ¡y ahora podrá abatir a sus enemigos con más poder que nunca!».

languages.text: "Alle wollen unter Euch dienen, es gibt Freiwillige ohne Ende! Als wir neulich einen verlassenen Sektor geräumt haben, um neue Wohnquartiere zu schaffen, haben wir einen vergessenen Lagerraum entdeckt. Mitten in der Bilge des Schiffs, buchstäblich unter unseren Füßen! Tja, und in diesem Lagerraum lagen jahrhundertealte Waffen. Sie sehen etwas merkwürdig aus, aber sie sind mächtig! Unsere lieben Techpriester haben bei der Montage und Weihung der Waffen geholfen. Und nun könnt Ihr Eure Feinde mit noch größerer Macht attackieren!"
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"

traits.locale_text: "Alle wollen unter Euch dienen, es gibt Freiwillige ohne Ende! Mitten in der Bilge des Schiffs, buchstäblich unter unseren Füßen! Tja, und in diesem Lagerraum lagen jahrhundertealte Waffen. Sie sehen etwas merkwürdig aus, aber sie sind mächtig! Unsere lieben Techpriester haben bei der Montage und Weihung der Waffen geholfen. Und nun könnt Ihr Eure Feinde mit noch größerer Macht attackieren!"

languages.text: "Takipçileriniz size hizmet etmeye can atıyor, sayıları her gün artıyor! Geçen gün yeni bir yaşam alanı kurmak üzere terk edilmiş sektörü temizliyorduk. O sırada gizli bir mahzen bulduk. Geminin ortasında, ayaklarımızın altında yani! Bu mahzende birtakım tuhaf ama güçlü, asırlık silahlar ortaya çıkardık! Faydalı Tekno Rahiplerimiz, bunların montaj ve kutsanma işlemlerini üstlendi. Artık düşmanlarınızla yüzleşirken çok daha güçlü silahlara sahip olacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "Everyone wants to serve under your command, there's no end to the volunteers! So the other day, when we were clearing out an abandoned sector for new living quarters, we found a forgotten vault. Right in the bilge of the ship, literally beneath our feet! Well, it turned out the vault had some centuries-old weapons in it — they look a bit odd, but they're powerful for sure! The good Tech-Priests helped with the assembly and consecration of the weapons — and now you can strike down your enemies with even greater might!"
